projects.title: BlogNest
projects.description: A dynamic and user-friendly blog posting web application using ReactJS and Appwrite, designed to enable users to effortlessly create, manage, and view blog posts.

projects.title: Drum Kit
projects.description: A fun app where each drum produce their respective sounds when clicked using keyboard or mouse. Check it out and enjoy the drum bits.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.description: A note-making web app where one can add their respective notes for future references. This web app is created using React.js performing crud operations like add, edit and delete.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A cool weather app made using Vanilla (pure) JavaScript. In this app, I have fetched openweathermap.org API for current weather report for the city entered by the user.
